documents.title: Upload documents
documents.p1: We have to make sure that you actually are who you claim to be and that you actually live here. This is why we need a few documents from you that confirm your data.
documents.p2: It is not yet possible to upload the documents here. Please send them to net@farue.rwth-aachen.de. We cannot enable your account without these documents.

list.title: Required dokuments:
list.rentalContract: First page of the rental contract or confirmation mail from Studierendenwerk
list.rentalContractExplanation: It is important that the document shows the apartment number as well as the rental start and rental end date.
list.idExplanation: e.g. passport, national ID card, RWTH BlueCard
